entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 10:01 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
